Description:
Located in the centre of the spa town of Arandjelovac, this luxurious 5-star hotel is next to Bukovicka Park. It features a large spa area with indoor and outdoor pools. An aqua park is also on site.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms of Hotel Izvor have an LCD TV with DVD player, a balcony, a minibar, and a bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms feature a private hot tub.

In Hotel Izvors spa complex, guests can relax in a wide range of saunas, steam baths and other wellness facilities. A large selection of massage, beauty and health treatments is available.

Guests of the Izvor can dine in the main buffet restaurant and in 2 à la carte restaurants serving international and Italian cuisine. There is also a lobby bar and a bar in the bowling alley.

Hotel Izvor features an internet café and offers free Wi-Fi. There is also a childrens playroom. Various daily excursions, such as trips to Oplenac, Oraac or to Monasteries dating back from 14th century, as well as wine tastings can be organised on site.

Belgrade is 75 km away from Hotel Izvor. Free private parking is available on site.
